title: i'm lvl 18 and i can't post
body: hii, i been trying to post in team recruitment and general for a while but can't because it says i need to be lvl 6 :<

replies.body: Sometimes an account needs a moment to sync up to the boards and get the accurate level.  You seem to be showing level 18 now, and should be able to post in team recruitment.  Let me know if you run into any issues!
